label: applicableStandard
comment: A referenced norm or requirement that establishes uniform criteria, methods, processes and practices, such as in engineering or technical areas.

domainIncludes.comment: A legal proof of ownership, worthiness or qualification to operate an agricultural item.
A collection of data for a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence about the identity of an animal or a batch of animals.
A piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence that an organization has met required organizational criteria.
A piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence that a process has met required criteria.
A piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence that a product batch has met required criteria.
A collection of data for a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence about the product.
A document issued by a government, public organization or association to certify a property of a person, entity, process or object.
A prominent attribute or aspect of a product.
A prominent attribute or aspect of a group of products considered or dealt with together.
A prominent attribute or aspect of an object, such as recyclability of a product, which can meet customer needs without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs.
The process of performing documented checks of sustainability characteristics, with a focus on discovering deviations, related to documented sustainability requirements.
A statement that user needs of the present are met without compromising the needs of future generations.
The evaluation of an object, such as a product, process, or organization, with respect to the object's worth or condition.
The process of certifying organizational performance or qualification requirements as stipulated in regulations.

A plan of action agreed or chosen in order to obey rules or requests made by people in authority and designed to prevent and detect violations of applicable law, regulations, rules and ethical standards by employees, agents and others.
The process of certifying that a process has met performance and quality assurance tests, or qualification requirements.
A prominent attribute or aspect of a process.
The process of certifying that a certain product batch has passed performance and quality assurance tests, or qualification requirements stipulated in regulations.
A prominent technical attribute or aspect.
A prominent attribute or aspect of an organization.
The process of certifying that a certain product has passed performance and quality assurance tests, or qualification requirements stipulated in regulations.
